name: Poodle Jumper
description:
Isaac Newton said "If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants."

The same could be said of Poodle Jumper, but about cats instead of giants.

Guide your cheerful poodle ever higher up the grassy platforms past the rolling clouds.

Watch out for Angry Dog, keep an eye open for Bouncy Cat and don't forget to gobble up all those yummy bones.

Featuring amusing sound effects and memorable graphics, Poodle Jumper will drive you barking.
